<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6110|עַצֻּמָה]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצוּם‎</span><sub>31</sub> **adjective** ==mighty, numerous==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.18.18|Gen 18:18]] +, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצוּמִים‎</span> [[Isa.8.7|Isa 8:7]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצֻמִים‎</span> [[Mic.4.3|Mic 4:3]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצוּמָיו‎</span> [[Ps.10.10|Ps 10:10]] — 

**1.** ***mighty***, especially of people, ***strong*** in numbers (often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּדוֺל‎</span>) [[Gen.18.18|Gen 18:18]]; [[Exod.1.9|Exod 1:9]] + 3 t. [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; [[Deut.4.38|Deut 4:38]] + 6 t. [[BDB#D|D]], [[Mic.4.3|Mic 4:3]]; [[Mic.4.7|Mic 4:7]]; [[Zech.8.22|Zech 8:22]]; [[Isa.60.22|Isa 60:22]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעִיר‎</span>), of locusts [[Joel.1.6|Joel 1:6]]; [[Joel.2.2|Joel 2:2]]; [[Joel.2.5|Joel 2:5]], compare v[[Joel.2.11|Joel 2:11]] so of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַיִל‎</span> [[Dan.11.25|Dan 11:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם לאֹ עָצוּם‎</span>, i.e. feeble [[Prov.30.26|Prov 30:26]] (of the <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפָן‎</span>); less often of individual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלָכִים ע‎</span> [[Ps.135.10|Ps 135:10]] of waters [[Isa.8.7|Isa 8:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> alone [[Prov.18.18|Prov 18:18]] ***the mighty***, [[Dan.8.24|Dan 8:24]]; [[Ps.10.10|Ps 10:10]] ***his mighty ones*** i.e. claws, of lion, so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others). 

**2.** ***numerous, countless*** (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַב‎</span>): [[Amos.5.12|Amos 5:12]]; [[Ps.35.18|Ps 35:18]] as substantive = ***many*** [[Isa.53.12|Isa 53:12]]; [[Prov.7.26|Prov 7:26]]. — [[Isa.41.21|Isa 41:21]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצֻמָה‎</span> below III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצם‎</span>. below 



 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצם‎</span> (√ of following, si vera lectio; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***defend, protect***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***defence***, see [[BDB#Du|Du]] and compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]; &gt; [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others ***your mighty things*** strong arguments (from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצוּם‎</span>, below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצם‎</span>, which following perhaps imitates in vocalization)).
